attributes.action: Put a limit on how many miles a large van or lorry is allowed to travel empty in any year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Possibly 40% or more of goods carrying vehicles are travelling empty on our roads. This means that 4 out of every van or lorry you see is probably empty. With an online website , transport companies would have to co-ordinate logistics and stop this maddness. Save on fuel , be green and cutdown congestion. Think about it , its simple , modern and green.
